question: Meaing of dream!
answer:
QUESTION
After doing lot of Ibadat and reciting dua e Noor and other duas during the Ramzaan. On the day after Eid ul fitr, I saw in my dream that I was in my old house in Bombay, it was night time and in white there was Allah written all over the sky and also other Allah's names. It was very peacefull in the dream. Can you please explain.
ANSWER


Share:
Ibaadat and Du'aa certainly invokes the mercy of Allah. The dream is a
reflection of the mercy of Allah due to the Ibaadat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
